column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
- Add more resources usage to increase performance
- Increase EC2 instances from 4 to 6 and change instance type from m6a.4xlarge to m6a.8xlarge
- Change RDS instance type from db.m5.4xlarge to db.m5.8xlarge
- Enable RDS Proxy. RDS Proxy will make applications more resilient to database failures
